name: interview-graphql-api
description: 1. Create a GraphQL endpoint on (/graphql) and multiple queries for comments, posts, post with an option for sort column. Consume data from the API endpoints provided in  	- Comments endpoint – https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/comments 	- View Single Post endpoint – https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/{post_id} 	- View All Posts endpoint – https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts
